openadk.library.impl
Class MessageDispatcher.EvDisp

java.lang.Object
  openadk.library.impl.MessageDispatcher.EvDisp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
MessageDispatcher
public class MessageDispatcher.EvDisp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

EvDisp thread handles a single dispatch request. Used when ALQ is disabled.

Constructor Summary
MessageDispatcher.EvDisp()
          Constructs an EvDisp and starts its thread

Constructor Detail

MessageDispatcher.EvDisp

public MessageDispatcher.EvDisp()
Constructs an EvDisp and starts its thread

Method Detail

notifyAckCode

public void notifyAckCode(int code)
Signals the waitForAckCode method that the processing of the dispatch request is ready for MessageDispatcher to return a SIF_Ack with this code.

notifyException

public void notifyException(java.lang.Throwable thr)
Signals the waitForAckCode method that an exception occurred during the processing of the dispatch request. It should stop waiting for a code and instead throw the exception.

dispatch

public int dispatch(Subscriber target,
                    Event event,
                    ZoneImpl zone,
                    Topic topic,
                    MessageInfo msgInfo)
             throws ADKMessagingException
Wakes up the thread, dispatches the event to Subscriber.onEvent, then returns the appropriate SIF_Ack code. If onEvent() completes processing without invoking SMB, this method returns once onEvent() is finished. If, however, onEvent() invokes SMB by instantiating a TrackQueryResults object, this method returns at the time the TrackQueryResults constructor is called.

Throws:
ADKMessagingException

run

public void run()
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
